name: Doge-TV
description: DogeTV is an innovative deflationary ecosystem born on the Ethereum blockchain (ERC20). By bringing TV and Web3 technology together in a revolutionary way, DogeTV presents to you an elite entertainment service, tied to a deflationary token ecosystem. DogeTV holders will have the opportunity to secure their own portion of the membership taxes, using our unique profit sharing system by minting an exclusive NFT With rising inflation around the world causing the cost of living to go through the roof, DogeTv have a solution that will not only save you money... but make you money too! Using Web3 technology and the blockchain, we bring to you a top quality entertainment service connected to a deflationary token. So cancel those overpriced cable subscriptions, buy DTV tokens, sit back and join us on our mission to the top.
